reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting place, only thing clean here is the sheet ( Yes one sheet ) everything and I mean everything ( Walls, Floor, Bathroom...etc) is 100% disgusting and gross. Cost about 15 dollars and hour or $50 for 4 hours. Lots of in and out traffic ( No pun intended) I think you know what kind of place this is, if not rent a film about 42nd street, NYC in the 70's.
reviews.title: Still Boiling my Clothes
